title: Our Security Promise to Your Family
subtitle: Your sanctuary is sacred. So is your privacy. We've built LegacyGuard on a foundation of world-class security principles to protect what matters most.

features.title: Fortress-Level Protection
features.description: Secure your account with the highest level of protection, including biometrics and hardware keys. You decide how strong the lock is.

features.title: Only You Hold the Key
features.description: Your information is encrypted on your device before it ever reaches us. Not even we can see it. Your privacy is mathematically guaranteed.

features.title: An Unbreakable Seal of Trust
features.description: Every critical action is recorded in a secure, unchangeable audit log. This creates a verifiable history for ultimate peace of mind.

features.title: Share with Absolute Control
features.description: When you share information, you are in complete control. Set time limits, track access, and know exactly who sees what, and when.

learnMore.text: Curious about the technical details? Read our full security documentation
